bio: It may only have one eye, but it's one of the sharpest in the Yo-kai World. It's trained all its life to be the perfect scout.

soultimate.name: Cinder Stare
soultimate.description: Burn foes for lots of damage.

skill.effect: No longer attracts attention from foes.
skill.name: Secrecy

name: Hypatroleye
